name: GetPagesbyContentType
description: Gets data from all pages of a given Content Type.

builderId.description: Builder ID specified in the settings of the CMS app.

content-type.description: Content Type identifier defined in the FastStore project.

versionId.description: Version ID presented in the URL path of a CMS preview.

releaseId.description: Release ID presented in the URL path of a CMS preview.

filters[{field}].description:
Filter results by a property of the page (e.g., `filters[status]`) or by a nested custom field of the `parameters` object (e.g., `filters[parameters.collection.sort]`).
*Replace {field} with the desired property.*

$ul: **data**: Array with data from all pages of the given Content Type.
**hasNextPage**: Indicates if there are more items to fetch.
